languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each void {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Флагман{/g} таранит врага и наносит {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}. Урон от тарана увеличивается на 10% за каждое потраченное {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}очко пустотного передвижения{/g}, начиная с третьей клетки пройденной дистанции между флагманом и врагом. После тарана и до конца хода флагман становится {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}замедленным{/g} и не может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовые{/g} орудия. ! Цель должна быть на расстоянии минимум 2 клеток ! Можно использовать только во время {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}фазы ускорения{/g}

traits.locale_text: The Flagship rams an enemy, dealing damage. This damage is increased by +10% for each movement point spent starting from the third cell of the distance between the Flagship and the enemy. After ramming the enemy and until the end of its turn, the Flagship is slowed and unable to use prow-mounted weapons. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the acceleration phase.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each void {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Флагман{/g} таранит врага и наносит {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}. Урон от тарана увеличивается на 10% за каждое потраченное {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}очко пустотного перемещения{/g}, начиная с третьей клетки пройденной дистанции между флагманом и врагом. После тарана и до конца хода флагман становится {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}замедленным{/g} и не может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовые{/g} орудия. ! Цель должна быть на расстоянии минимум 2 клеток ! Можно использовать только во время {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}фазы ускорения{/g}
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each void {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

languages.text: Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} rammt einen Feind und fügt ihm {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu. Letzterer erhöht sich um 10 % für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}Leere-Bewegungspunkt{/g}, der zum Rammen des feindlichen Schiffes nach einem Anflug von 3 Feldern verbraucht wird. Danach ist das Flaggschiff bis zum Ende seines Zuges {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}verlangsamt{/g} und kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g}-Waffen einsetzen. ! Das Ziel muss mindestens 2 Felder entfernt sein. ! Kann nur während der {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Beschleunigungsphase{/g} verwendet werden.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each void {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} rammt einen Feind und fügt ihm Schaden zu. Letzterer erhöht sich um 10 % für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkt{/g}, der zum Rammen des Feindschiffes nach der Zurücklegung des dritten Feldes verbraucht wird. Nach dem Rammen und bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} ist das Flaggschiff {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} und kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bugwaffen{/g} einsetzen. ! Das Ziel muss mindestens 2 Felder entfernt sein. ! Kann nur während der {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}Beschleunigungsphase{/g} verwendet werden.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} éperonne un ennemi et lui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Ces dégâts augmentent de 10 % par {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}point de déplacement dans le vide{/g} utilisé pour rejoindre le vaisseau ennemi, mais uniquement après avoir parcouru trois cases. Le vaisseau amiral est ensuite {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}ralenti{/g} et incapable d'utiliser les armes montées sur sa {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son tour. ! La cible doit se trouver à au moins 2 cases. ! Uniquement utilisable lors de la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}phase d'accélération{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each void {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} éperonne un ennemi et lui inflige des dégâts. Ces dégâts augmentent de 10 % par {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}point de déplacement{/g} utilisé pour rejoindre le vaisseau ennemi, mais uniquement après avoir parcouru trois cases. Après avoir éperonné l'ennemi et jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le vaisseau amiral est {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralenti{/g} et incapable d'utiliser les armes montées sur sa {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g}. ! La cible doit se trouver à au moins 2 cases. ! Uniquement utilisable lors de la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}phase d'accélération{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}使用撞角撞击敌舰，造成{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。旗舰撞击敌舰之前，每消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}，最终造成的撞击伤害就会提高10%。不过，只有当旗舰至少移动3格时，此撞击伤害加值才会生效。撞击敌舰之后，直到回合结束前，旗舰都会处于{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}减速{/g}状态，而且无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}武器。 ！目标必须在至少2格之外。 ！只能在{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速阶段{/g}使用。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}使用撞角撞击敌人，造成伤害。旗舰撞击敌人之前，每消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，最终造成的撞击伤害就会提高10%。不过，只有当旗舰至少移动3格时，才能撞击敌舰。撞击敌舰之后，直到敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前，旗舰都会处于{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，而且无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}武器。 ！目标与旗舰必须保持至少2格距离。 ！此能力只能在{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速阶段{/g}使用。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} embiste a un enemigo infligiendo {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g}. El daño aumenta un +10 % por cada {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}punto de movimiento{/g} del vacío invertido por la nave para llegar hasta el enemigo, pero solo cuentan después de moverse tres casillas. Después, la nave queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}ralentizada{/g} y no puede usar armas de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} hasta el final del turno. ! El objetivo debe estar al menos a 2 casillas de distancia. ! Solo se puede usar durante la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}fase de aceleración{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each void {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} embiste a un enemigo, infligiendo daño. El daño infligido aumenta un +10 % por cada {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}punto de movimiento{/g} empleado por la nave insignia para llegar al enemigo, sin contar las primeras tres casillas. Tras embestir al enemigo y hasta que termine su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, la nave insignia queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizada{/g} y no puede usar las armas de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g}. ! El objetivo debe estar al menos a 2 casillas de distancia. ! Solo se puede usar durante la {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}fase de aceleración{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が敵に突進して、{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このダメージは旗艦が敵まで移動するために消費した{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}ヴォイド移動ポイント{/g}につき +10%増加するが、3セルを移動しなければ増加しない。それから旗艦は{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}減速{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}の武器を使用できなくなる。 ! ターゲットが2セル以上離れていなければならない。 ! {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速フェーズ{/g}中のみ使用可能。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away. ! Can only be used during the {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}acceleration phase{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が敵へ突撃し、ダメージを与える。このダメージは旗艦が敵艦へと移動する際に消費した{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}1につき+10%増加するが、3セル以上移動しなければ使用できない。敵に衝突した後、その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終了まで、旗艦{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}はスロウ{/g}状態となり、{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}に搭載した武器を使用できなくなる。 ！ターゲットは2セル以上離れていなければならない。 ！{g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationPhaseSpace}加速フェーズ{/g}中にのみ使用可能。
